TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_sign
inventory=[{"type": "bowl", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 31}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a jungle_sign, I need to place 6 jungle_planks in a row in the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 jungle_plank from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_sign

thought: I need to place another jungle_plank in the crafting grid, next to the previous one. I will move 1 jungle_plank from slot 31 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1
